messages.subject: Re: the March snows
messages.msgSnippet: Mary, could you please send someone to pick up your weather?  It seems to have drifted into Ohio.  THIS IS NOT WHAT OHIO MARCHES ARE SUPPOSED TO BE
messages.messageBody:
Mary,
could you please send someone to pick up your weather? It seems to
have drifted into Ohio. THIS IS NOT WHAT OHIO MARCHES ARE SUPPOSED TO
BE LIKE!!!!!!!! Rachel was out skiing yesterday on the back 8. Oh
well, the dog likes the snow. As for the rest of us, make it go
away!!! We only like it in December and January.

Bridget

--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., "zenmomma *" <zenmomma@h...> wrote:

> Wahh! Come here to Park City. It's officially Spring here which
means that
> the snow is only one foot deep now. :-/
>
> Life is good.
> ~Mary
>
> _

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] the March snows
messages.msgSnippet: Generally speaking you have to drive all the way to Mt. Shasta to see real snow.  This year there are places within 1/2 hour to 45 minutes where there is a
messages.messageBody:
Generally speaking you have to drive all the way to Mt. Shasta to see real
snow. This year there are places within 1/2 hour to 45 minutes where there
is a foot of snow.

We generally have over 300 growing days and rarely have more than a dozen
frost days and none that stick.

THIS year we have had over 30 frost days and about half a dozen that stuck!

We choose to live here because it is right next to the ocean, we have REAL
trees <g> AND it doesn't get cold! Now, whoever you are out there that is
sending us THEIR weather, well please take it back!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Lynda
----- Original Message -----
From: "zenmomma *" <zenmomma@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, March 23, 2002 1:39 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] the March snows


> >>Lynda, looking at snow on the hills in MARCH which is unheard of!>>
>
> Wahh! Come here to Park City. It's officially Spring here which means that
> the snow is only one foot deep now. :-/
>
> Life is good.
> ~Mary

messages.subject: the March snows
messages.msgSnippet: ... Wahh! Come here to Park City. It s officially Spring here which means that the snow is only one foot deep now. :-/ Life is good. ~Mary
messages.messageBody:
>>Lynda, looking at snow on the hills in MARCH which is unheard of!>>

Wahh! Come here to Park City. It's officially Spring here which means that
the snow is only one foot deep now. :-/

Life is good.
~Mary
